kid_friendly.description: Kids will actually eat it - familiar flavours, not too spicy

balanced_guilt_free.description: Parents feel good serving it on a Tuesday - not a treat, a proper meal

adult_appeal.description: Adults enjoy it too - important for non-parent orderers

fussy_eater_friendly.description: Mild options available, customisable for picky kids

customisation.description: Individual preferences can be accommodated within the order

value_at_25.description: Feels worth it for a family of 4 at the £25 price point

shareability.description: Can come in one big portion for family sharing at the table

vegetarian_option.description: Good veggie alternative available (not an afterthought)

on_dinneroo_menu.description: Actually available on Dinneroo (verified against menu catalog)

repeat_rate_min.justification: 20% repeat rate is achievable (top 41% of zones) while still being meaningful. Validated: zones with 20%+ repeat rate have significantly better outcomes.

rating_min.justification: 4.3+ rating shows statistically significant correlation with repeat rate (p<0.05). 4.5 threshold showed NO significant difference (p=0.21).

cuisine_count_min.justification: Cuisine count has STRONGEST correlation with repeat rate (r=0.514). Zones with 4+ cuisines have significantly higher repeat rates (p<0.001).

evidence_types.Measured: 3+ factors have direct survey data (n≥5 per dish)
evidence_types.Blended: 1-2 factors have survey data, rest estimated

score_conversion.description: Convert survey success rates to 1-5 scores
